thread.title: Prince William's dad dancing is the internet's latest obsession
thread.title_full: Prince William's dad dancing is the internet's latest obsession

author: Sam Haysom
title: Prince William's dad dancing is the internet's latest obsession
text:
It's not often we see members of the royal family really letting their hair down.
Typically, the only time they're seen in public is during big events and ceremonies, where they're dressed formally and conducting themselves in a serious, regal fashion.
Behind all that formality, though, there's apparently a wild side just waiting to be unleashed.
SEE ALSO: Small child meets the Queen, throws wildly unimpressed tantrum
On Tuesday, TMZ shared two videos of a man they claim is Prince William, busting out some gloriously slick dance moves in a nightclub in Verbier, Switzerland.
Is it actually him, though?
Well obviously we all badly, badly want it to be, but the face of the figure in the videos is a slightly blurry one.
There's definitely a resemblance, but it's impossible to 100% sure.
On the other hand, Prince William has been photographed in Verbier recently, where the press has widely reported he's currently on holiday with friends.
Either way, let's hope he never, ever stops throwing those sweet shapes.
Everyone needs to relax and give Prince William a break... the geezer had a few beers on holiday and threw some dad dance moves #legend
â€” Jack Hiscock (@JackHiscock) March 15, 2017
